name: Congenital Ventricular Septal Aneurysm with Eisenmenger Syndrome
chief_complaint: My child gets tired very quickly and turns blue when playing

lab_results.Echocardiogram: large ventricular septal aneurysm with right-to-left shunt

prognosis: Guarded; irreversible pulmonary hypertension limits life expectancy without transplant
description: A rare congenital cardiac anomaly where a ventricular septal defect develops an aneurysmal pouch, leading to Eisenmenger physiology due to chronic left-to-right shunting causing pulmonary vascular disease and shunt reversal. Presents with progressive cyanosis and exercise intolerance.
multiple_choice: Congenital Ventricular Septal Aneurysm with Eisenmenger Syndrome
